remarks: The inverse of a nonzero group element is not zero.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
grpinvnzcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpinvnzcl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpinvnzcl.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpinvnz $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) -> ( N ` X ) =/= .0. ) $.
